backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three removal tasks: removing CertificationsGallery from App.tsx, and deleting both CertificationsGallery.tsx and CertificateModal.tsx component files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, and configuration, describing a portfolio application with hero section, professional details, certifications gallery, and modal viewer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, page title 'Jerry Osiobe Portfolio', and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component rendering the portfolio layout with HeroSection, ProfessionalSummary, CoreCompetencies, Education, ProfessionalCertifications, ProfessionalExperience, ResearchPapers, Interests, and Footer components in sequence.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Empty file with no content, previously contained a modal component for viewing certification images.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Empty file with no content, previously contained a gallery component for displaying certification images in a grid.
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: Component displaying nine core technical competencies in a responsive grid with icons from lucide-react, including project management, AutoCAD, cybersecurity, data analytics, and networking skills.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Component listing three educational qualifications with degree, institution, and year details, displayed in card format with graduation cap icons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice for current year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters and heart icon.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with gradient background, profile image, engineer's name and credentials, contact information (email, phone, location), and a download CV button linking to PDF file.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: Component displaying five personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) with corresponding icons in a horizontal flex layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: Component organizing professional certifications into six categories (Engineering Memberships, Project Management, Data & AI, Cybersecurity, Process Improvement, Technical Courses) displayed in a two-column grid with icons and bullet lists.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Displays a timeline of professional work experiences with company names, job titles, periods, and responsibilities. Includes a visual timeline with dots and lines for desktop view.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Renders a centered professional summary section with a brief paragraph describing engineering expertise and skills.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists research papers and publications with titles and DOI links that open in new tabs. Each paper card has hover effects and external link icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication support, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the portfolio uses static content without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, typography styles, and utility classes including a grid pattern background.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordions and fade effects.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking version 23 of a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Ebruvwiyor Osiobe. Contains architectural notes describing a single-page portfolio with sections for hero, summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience, publications, and interests, plus a list of implemented features mapped to requirements.
